actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to authorize diversion of water used by Alaska Power Administration from Eklutna Lake, Alaska, for the public water supply purposes of the city of Anchorage.

summary.text: Permits a portion of the waters reserved for the operation of the Eklutna Lake hydropower project to be diverted from Eklutna Lake for public water supply purposes if compensation for reduced electric energy production due to such diversion is made pursuant to the February 1984 agreement between the municipality of Anchorage and the Alaska Power Administration.

titles.title: A bill to authorize diversion of water used by Alaska Power Administration from Eklutna Lake, Alaska, for the public water supply purposes of the city of Anchorage.
